overview: Balli (Kiran Kumar) plays the main Antagonist. His illegal government operates in Jaipur district of Rajasthan; the police are his happy pony. He's the mastermind of many illegal and criminal ventures with access to the top who is targeted by Birju. Master ji's granddaughter Ritu (Gunjan Pant) falls in love with Birju but Birju does not even see her because her destination was different. For which he starts searching for Birju so that he can avenge blood with blood.
title: Balli Vs Birju
